txt.en: You have been tasked with destroying fell sarcophagi and burning the remains of fallen Angmarim.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from one of the barrows within Gundabad. Deep within the barrow, several of the sarcophagi have been twisted, and foul creatures have begun to come forth. Additionally, the remains of several Angmarim littered the area.

'Enter the barrows, destroy the corrupted sarcophagi and destroy the remains of the foul invaders!'
'Amongst the barrows in the depths Gundabad, the spirits of our forefathers are being disturbed.\n\n'Your mission is to destroy fell sarcophagi and burn the corpses of the Angmarim.'
Monsters in this mission will continue to join the fight until their entry-point is destroyed.
Your mission is to destroy several corrupted sarcophagi and burn the corpses of the Angmarim scattered throughout.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to barrows.
'Well done! With the deed done, our ancestors can find rest in Gundabad!'
